mapper.insert: INSERT INTO home.users ( id, email, enabled, name, avatar, password, activate_code, date_registration ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{email}, #{enabled}, #{name}, #{avatar}, #{password}, #{activateCode}, #{registrationDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE home.users SET enabled = #{enabled}, activate_code = 'ACTIVATED' WHERE home.users.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT home.users.id, email, name, avatar, activate_code, password, date_registration, r.id, r.role, enabled FROM home.users JOIN home.user_role_map rm ON rm.user_id = id JOIN home.role r ON r.id = rm.role_id WHERE home.users.email = #{email}

SELECT home.users.id, email, name, avatar, password, activate_code, date_registration, r.id, r.role, enabled FROM home.users JOIN home.user_role_map rm ON rm.user_id = id JOIN home.role r ON r.id = rm.role_id WHERE home.users.activate_code = #{code}
